data.title: New Media 2017
data.meta_description: New Media 2017 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. This document provides contact information for various Sri Lankan media organizations, including government departments, military spokespeople, newspapers, radio stations, and TV channels. It lists the Ministry of Parliamentary Reforms and Mass Media and the Department of Government Information, and provides contact details for spokespeople of the Sri Lankan Army, Air Force, Navy, and Police. It then has multiple pages listing details of numerous Sinhala, Tamil, and English newspapers, radio stations across regions of Sri Lanka, and TV channels.
